title: Can you guys make SD Syndra blonde like in the splash art?
body:
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-K96FcY1bbcg/Vl3zap5HSeI/AAAAAAAA1j0/Oe77fgGRIF4/s1600/SyndraLoadScreen_4.png

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4F6KGARUKCI/Vl4m9ORDuzI/AAAAAAAAJO8/3JhG62yPMDE/s1600/syndraturn.jpg

This is obviously an art inconsistancy, she has brown hair in-game and blonde hair in the splash,
but changing the splash art would be complicated seeing as that they've already made an animated login screen with her being depicted as blonde, and of course they could fix it by remaking the splash art and the animated login screen with brown hair, but I'd say the other option is much easier

Since she's already depicted as blonde in the splash (and login screen), you could do the easy thing and make her blonde in-game so that it's not longer an art inconsistancy

(Plus she looks better in the skin as blonde let's be honest)

replies.body: It's dirty blond: a mix between blond and brunette. Depending on the light, it resembles either
